mainHero.title: your AI powered
mainHero.subtitle: urban life companion
mainHero.description: Do you like to live in the moment? With BuddyGo, you can access all the events in your city, and with the AI-supported recommendation system, you can instantly participate in events that match your instant emotions and preferences!

product.title: Suggestions that care about your feelings.

items.title: Suggestions that care about your feelings.
items.description: There are many apps in your life that give you recommendations about TV shows, movies, books, new posts, and new friends. All these are lists created by tracking your long-term behavior. However we know how effective our emotions are in making instant decisions. Talk about your feelings in writing or verbally, and BuddyGo will use natural language processing models to bring up the activity that best matches your emotions. Say “I want to explore new things today!” and get started.

items.title: The whole city is here!
items.description: You have all the events in your city at your fingertips. Cinema, theater, concerts, ice hockey, new tastes, courses for instruments you've never heard of... Choose the one you like the most and join instantly!

features.title: Instant & about you
features.subtitle: Attends to the moment!
features.description: BuddyGo is a mobile application that offers you the most suitable events for you by analyzing your instant emotions and preferences. With the AI-supported recommendation system, you can instantly participate in events that match your instant emotions and preferences!

items.name: Everything is in front of your eyes
items.description: You can access all the events in your city with a single click.

items.name: Whatever you feel
items.description: You can instantly participate in events that match your instant emotions and preferences.

items.name: Keep track of your activities
items.description: You can keep track of the activities you have participated in and the activities you want to participate in.

items.name: Special events for you
items.description: With premium membership, you can access special events that are only available to you.

items.name: Enterprise
features: Ability to add your own events
